sentences.sentence: Skin care products, hair care products, deodorizers and perfumes, and cleansing products can all be made naturally.
sentences.translation: 护肤产品，护发产品，除臭剂和香水，还有清洁用品都可以是天然制成的。

sentences.sentence: Sales of air fresheners and deodorizers also dropped. "If you're lucky enough to have a couple of extra dollars, do you really need your bathroom to smell minty fresh?" asks Shea.
sentences.translation: 空气清晰剂和除臭剂销量也在跌，“如果你足够幸运有多余的钱，你真正需要使浴室有薄荷的香味吗？”
